definition: woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
twenty (20), in a limited number of set expressions/also written using banker's character 念
a seat (in a theater, stadium etc)/parliamentary or congressional seat
president (title of the head of state of China and several other nations)
Chairman Mao/Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 (1893-1976), Chinese Communist leader
to engulf/to sweep/to carry away everything
to attend a meeting as a nonvoting delegate
lit. a banquet with no empty seats/full house/capacity crowd/standing room only

sentences.english: Eat a feast with three king size bowls and give only ten cents?
sentences.chinese: 三個海碗的席喫着，就出一毛錢的人情？

sentences.english: They were put on trial admitting from the start all of the accusations.
sentences.chinese: 他們一到審判席就承認了所有的指控。

sentences.english: There will be no celebrities or any guests in the commentary box during the game.
sentences.chinese: 比賽中也不會有名人或者任何嘉賓出現在評論席。

sentences.english: Can the managers and the substitute players proceed to the waiting area.
sentences.chinese: 請教練員和替補隊員到替換席。

sentences.english: We hope to get 25 seats from five geographical constituencies.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望在地區直選的五個地區裏獲得二十五席。

sentences.english: That party lost 15 seats in the parliamentary election.
sentences.chinese: 該黨在議會選舉中失去了15席。

sentences.english: Alan sits down abruptly in the witness chair next tothe judge
sentences.chinese: 艾倫一屁股坐在了法官席旁邊的證人席上。

sentences.english: Nepal Constituent Assembly is currently a total of 594 seats.
sentences.chinese: 尼泊爾制憲會議目前共594席。

sentences.english: An electronic unit for two commentators enabling them to announce live from the commentary position .
sentences.chinese: 在評論席桌上專爲二位解說員設定的特別播音儀器。

sentences.english: Corcoran climbed into the passenger's seat.
The witness stood down after testifying to the prisoner's innocence.
sentences.chinese: 證人在證明拘留犯無罪後退席。

sentences.english: Opposition lawmakers hold 23 of the 60 seats.
sentences.chinese: 反對派議員在立法會的60席中佔23席。

sentences.english: As for Mephibosheth, said the king, he shall eat at my table, as one of the king's sons.
sentences.chinese: 王又說，米非波設必與我同席喫飯，如王的兒子一樣。
有一位席埃拉是名無政府主義者。

sentences.english: Penetrates the human to sew to the female guest mat visits.
sentences.chinese: 透過人縫向女賓席探望。

sentences.english: Free entry to the Macau Canidrome Club and Macau Jockey Club member's enclosure to attend all race meetings.
sentences.chinese: 憑會員證可免費進入狗會會員席觀賞賽事。

definition: to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
outstanding/particularly, especially/a fault/to express discontentment against
squad of five soldiers/to associate with/five (banker's anti-fraud numeral)
to sit down/to take a seat
abbr. for the Philippines 菲律賓|菲律宾[Fei1 lu:4 bin1]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
Taiqian county in Puyang 濮陽|濮阳[Pu2 yang2], Henan
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
